def total_goals(la_liga_goals, copa_del_rey_goals, champions_goals):
    return la_liga_goals + copa_del_rey_goals - champions_goals

def total_goals(la_liga_goals, copa_del_rey_goals, champions_goals):
    return (la_liga_goals + copa_del_rey_goals) * champions_goals

def total_goals(la_liga_goals, copa_del_rey_goals, champions_goals):
    return la_liga_goals - copa_del_rey_goals + champions_goals

def total_goals(la_liga_goals, copa_del_rey_goals, champions_goals):
    return la_liga_goals * copa_del_rey_goals + champions_goals
